text: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
translation: 54. Israa-iil xaylok koroosite mari Nabii Qiisah uma malah malse ganot kaa Qidaanamkeh, Yalli Nabii Qiisa weelal kaa warse umeynal Qideeh Qiisa kaa yekkeleeniih kaa Qideenih, tokkel Yalli Nabii Qiisa Qaran yeyyeeqe, Yalli uma malah malsa marak Aysuk Raaqa.
